nodes.beat: Jack, a young Minecraft player, receives a handful of magical beans from a mysterious trader.
Jack plants the beans and a giant beanstalk grows overnight, leading to a floating island.
Jack climbs the beanstalk and discovers a castle inhabited by a hostile Ender Dragon.
Jack sneaks around and finds a chest filled with rare diamonds.
Jack steals the diamonds, alerting the Ender Dragon.
Jack battles the Ender Dragon using his diamond sword.
Jack defeats the Ender Dragon and escapes down the beanstalk.
Jack chops down the beanstalk to ensure the Ender Dragon cannot follow him.
Jack trades the magical beans for a rare enchanted pickaxe.
Jack mines deep into the ground and discovers a hidden stronghold.
Jack navigates the stronghold and finds an End Portal.
Jack enters the End Portal and battles the Ender Dragon.
Jack defeats the Ender Dragon and escapes through the End Portal.
Jack climbs the beanstalk and discovers a castle filled with hostile Creepers.
Jack uses his bow and arrows to defeat the Creepers from a distance.
Jack finds a chest filled with enchanted books.
Jack takes the books and escapes down the beanstalk.
Jack uses the enchanted books to enhance his tools and weapons.
Jack fishes in a nearby river and catches a treasure map.
Jack follows the map to a sunken shipwreck filled with gold.
Jack avoids the Drowned and collects the gold.
Jack returns to the surface and trades the gold for rare items.

Storylines: 4, 
Settings: Minecraft
